meta.job_title: Frontend Web Developer - Machine Learning Developer Tools

duties_responsibilities.duty: Develop user-friendly web services and applications for machine learning developer tools.
Utilize front-end frameworks like Vue (preferred), React, Angular to create responsive web UI design patterns.
Experience with web-stack development in a Linux environment, with expertise in Python or JavaScript (TypeScript).
Create and maintain web services using technologies such as REST and JSON.
Identify and solve issues in production systems, ensuring seamless operation.
Work with back-end frameworks and build web APIs to support seamless interaction with backend developers.
Possess basic knowledge of machine learning to contribute to the development of machine learning-based tools.
Quickly learn and adapt to new software, pipelines, and procedures.
Develop and maintain tools that support production systems.
Effectively communicate and collaborate within the development team.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in Computer Science or related field (Master's preferred)
